name: Super Battle Machine Boxing
description:
Battle your way through two bosses is this new take on punch-out! 

Super Battle Machine Boxing is a up to two player boxing game, featuring two quirky bosses, flashy visual, catchy music, and gameply that'll keep you hooked! That was a boxing pun, by the way. 

This game was developed in three months by a small group of high school software development students. We hope you enjoy what we've put together!
